remarks: Value of the group sum operation over an arbitrary finite set. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 15-Dec-2014.)  Obsolete version of ~ gsumval3 as of 31-May-2019.  (New usage is discouraged.) (Proof modification is discouraged.)
statement:
gsumval3.b $e |- B = ( Base ` G ) $.
gsumval3.0 $e |- .0. = ( 0g ` G ) $.
gsumval3.p $e |- .+ = ( +g ` G ) $.
gsumval3.z $e |- Z = ( Cntz ` G ) $.
gsumval3.g $e |- ( ph -> G e. Mnd ) $.
gsumval3.a $e |- ( ph -> A e. V ) $.
gsumval3.f $e |- ( ph -> F : A --> B ) $.
gsumval3.c $e |- ( ph -> ran F C_ ( Z ` ran F ) ) $.
gsumval3OLD.m $e |- ( ph -> M e. NN ) $.
gsumval3OLD.h $e |- ( ph -> H : ( 1 ... M ) -1-1-> A ) $.
gsumval3OLD.n $e |- ( ph -> ( `' F " ( _V \ { .0. } ) ) C_ ran H ) $.
gsumval3OLD.w $e |- W = ( `' ( F o. H ) " ( _V \ { .0. } ) ) $.
gsumval3OLD $p |- ( ph -> ( G gsum F ) = ( seq 1 ( .+ , ( F o. H ) ) ` M ) ) $.
